tracks.name: Tired of Me
tracks.lyrics:
Time's a railroad on rusting tracks
forever going away, never coming back
Every new thing makes the world worse
steps away from home summon the hearse

I'm tired, I'm oh so tired, I'm tired, I'm oh so tired of me

Look at this mess that you've made
Cancelling the great pyramid over slaves
Every little problem could be solved with force
Memories bring comfort; blinders to a horse

I'm tired, I'm oh so tired, I'm tired, I'm of so tired of me 

Why can't everything just stay in line?
Who are you to say I'm losing my mind?
In the corner with the paint drying and the walls closing in
I'm oh so tired of me

tracks.name: Life Disease
tracks.lyrics:
I've seen the sunset before    
Yeah, I've tasted food
A job's a job; no net effect 
Good and bad and kind and rude

Don't feel sad
I don't feel sad 
Seeing that ghoul staring back at me

Paradise dust mites; cemetery wildflowers
You get used to the routine
It's life disease, it's being human
Simple regression to the mean

No matter how horrible
No matter how wonderful

You'll get used to it

tracks.name: Freak Flag
tracks.lyrics:
Don't abandon your dreams
Shut them out until they leave you 
In the middle of the night 
Over what you've become

You're not the man
You're not the man you once were 
You're not the man who fell in love with
You're not the man who fell

Furl that freak flag
Stow it in the overhead bin
Left behind in the rush to the exit
End up in the lost and found in Berlin

Blame the alarm clock 
Blame the everything  
As though that changes something 
Like that counts as a win

tracks.name: Nocebo
tracks.lyrics:
See package for additional warnings
Consult doctor for sensations of burning
Talk to therapist if the world's stopped turning

It's the price of doing business
A tax that must be paid

Press down and turn use as directed
Side effects may include feeling infected
May include dry mouth, extra sensory perceptions 
may include feelings of identity and direction

It's the price of doing business
A tax that must be paid
Magic bullets don't come cheap magic bullet never free
Magic bullet might hit the mark magic bullet might ricochet

tracks.name: Dirtiest Bomb
tracks.lyrics:
When The Road comes true you can have no doubt
I'll sink my teeth in a baby before the canned goods run out
When you're busy with stretchers and saline trying to save lives
I'll be safe in the bunker, like a cockroach I'll survive

Life's the only thing worth living for
Got one eye on the clock got one foot out the door

Now I may not be the smartest maybe not the strongest
maybe not the bravest, but I'm staying alive the longest
Impatiently waiting for society's fall
They got the dirty bomb but I'll out-dirty them all

Life's the only thing worth living for
Got one eye on the clock got one foot out the door
 
I'm putting all my money into ammo and gold
I may not like life but at least I'm getting old
I'm putting my money in ammo
I'm putting my money in gold

tracks.name: Convulsive Lyres
tracks.lyrics:
Best viewed through a prism
It's all in who you know 
Boomeranging altruism
Might as well enjoy the show

Compulsive liars
Never feel the ground
Convulsive lyres
Never making a sound

Does the left hand know its action 
Exegesis of thin air 
Multiplication or subtraction
Who could say what's ever there 

If you believe it 
who could deny it
If it's for sale
Someone is ready to buy it

Repackaged self hypnosis
Snakes are oiled have no fear
Mystery cult built on gnosis 
Hats off to the man of the year

tracks.name: Instant Death
tracks.lyrics:
Als het komt
En het niet wil
Laat het snel zijn
Zonder voorafschaduwing
Zonder herkenning
het beste voor iedereen
Onmiddellijke dood
Grootvader sterft, vader sterft, kinderen sterven

tracks.name: Creator
tracks.lyrics:
Here in your cell you can regulate, chastise
Here in your cell you can monitor and recontextualize 
Here in your cell you feel safest of all
So much to share as you're bearing the pall

We are not family

Takes at scale, so many tastes to be made
Content production, industrial grade
As above so below, as above so below, 
How else can we know who's damned and who's saved


There's nothing wrong with not having an opinion 
There's nothing wrong with shutting up

If all we want is all we need
All we're left with constant need
Contrary to opinion, you can just not listen
Contrary to opinion, you can always step outside

tracks.name: Crawlspace Dictator
tracks.lyrics:
Crawlspace dictator
Breakroom commandant 
Bus shelter vigilante
Parking space amateur cop

Defend
your territory 
No one gets over
No one gets in 

Block patrol headmaster
Mayor of the gas station
Strip mall general
Gulag homeowner association

Who makes the monsters
Who crafts the hatred in their hearts
Surely not from nowhere
Who's responsible for this dark?
Maintain and preserve
Strength from within

tracks.name: The Knife
tracks.lyrics:
Left right
Back and forth
Straight ahead
Don't think
Don't blink
Fucking fight
Take it all
Take it in
Take it all

I've seen this road before
The stairs up that hill
My hands your hands
the knife the rope
A friend with broken hearts
and unhealed scars 
Your sisters hopes and 
broken chairs

Take this fucker 
For all we got 
Take this fucker
To the end

Fuck your 
Fuck your 
sacrifice

tracks.name: If I Can't Have What I Want
tracks.lyrics:
On a chain gang
Clearly swim or sink 
Codependence
Never going to blink
If I can't have what I want 

Enemy of an enemy
Doesn't make a friend
Compromise is cowardice
See it to the end 
If I can't have what I want

Playing chicken 
With passenger lives 
That practicality
Reject and despise
If I can't have what I want, I don't want anyone to have anything

tracks.name: Pagans Won
tracks.lyrics:
Rename the holidays
Duct tape new fictions to old
Wallpaper on nature
Bubbles straight through like mold

You can update the local gods
Pretend they forgive  
Prove we're all the same
Sort by color, culture, caste

You can document the world
Disprove ghosts and myths
Nuance, intersectionality 
Sticks surrounding an ax

Pagans won

paragraphs: All music & lyrics by Dan Goldberg, Mike Wolf, JD Foster.

paragraphs.text: Engineered & Mixed by Dan Godwin at
paragraphs.suffix: in Takoma Park, Maryland in early 2024.

footer: Streaming services are worse than the record industry was before it. Support artists directly.
